# sphere

**Instance Property**

The correction for farsightedness.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var sphere: HKQuantity { get }
```

## Discussion

This quantity uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/diopter()] units. The range is -10.5 to +6.5.

## Accessing lens specification data

- **cylinder**: Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the strength of the correction.
- **axis**: Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the orientation fo the correction.
- **addPower**: The correction for nearsightedness.
